name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Big Data Engineer with 9+ years of comprehensive experience in developing and implementing scalable data solutions. Proficient in **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, and managing data lakes using **Glue Data Catalog** and **Lake Formation**. Skilled in programming languages including **Java** and **Python**, and adept in SQL for effective database management. Experienced in streaming architectures utilizing **Kinesis** and familiar with handling data security using **IAM**. Proven track record in Agile methodologies, capable of leading cross-functional teams to drive innovative projects successfully while optimizing performance metrics. Strong background in leveraging technology stacks like **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, and **.NET** for comprehensive full stack development.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **AWS** services such as **S3** and **Kinesis** to enhance data storage and streaming capabilities in big data applications.
Designed and implemented robust ETL processes using **Glue Data Catalog** and **Lake Formation**, increasing data accessibility by **30%**.
Developed data pipelines in **Python** and **Java** for efficient data processing and transformation tasks, boosting performance by **15%**.
Deployed infrastructure as code using **Terraform** to streamline environment setups, reducing provisioning time by **50%**.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment to iterate on data projects effectively, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality solutions.
Implemented **IAM** policies to secure data access and ensure compliance with data governance standards.
Created and managed **Helm Charts** for deploying data services in Kubernetes, improving application scalability and reliability.
Optimized SQL queries for big data analytics, leading to a **25%** reduction in query execution times.
Engaged in continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to facilitate regular updates and improve deployment efficiency.
Provided mentorship and guidance to junior engineers, fostering skill development in big data technologies.

Utilized **AWS** and **GCP** to enhance cloud infrastructure and manage data effectively for Big Data solutions, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Developed and maintained **SQL** databases and utilized **AWS Glue Data Catalog** for data cataloging and management, improving data retrieval speed by **40%**.
Implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, streamlining the deployment process and reducing environment setup time by **50%**.
Applied Agile methodologies to manage project timelines and deliverables, consistently meeting deadlines on over **10** major releases.
Designed and orchestrated data workflows with **Kinesis** and **Lake Formation**, enabling efficient streaming architecture and real-time data processing.
Created intricate data pipelines leveraging **Python** for data transformation, resulting in a **30%** reduction in processing time.
Led efforts in data governance by configuring **IAM** policies for secure access to data across multiple environments, enhancing security posture.
Monitored system performance and conducted optimization strategies resulting in a **20%** increase in query efficiency on large datasets.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements, leading to the successful completion of at least **5** large-scale data projects.
Conducted training and mentorship sessions for junior engineers, fostering skill development and improving overall team productivity.

Leveraged **AWS** services and **GCP** to enhance data processing capabilities, contributing to a **30%** improvement in data pipeline performance.
Developed and implemented **Terraform** scripts to automate infrastructure provisioning, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment time.
Utilized **Python** and **Java** for data transformation and analysis, managing large datasets with **SQL** for optimized querying efficiency.
Designed and maintained a modern data architecture using **Glue Data Catalog** and **Lake Formation** for efficient data lake management.
Implemented **IAM** for secure access control, ensuring regulatory compliance and data security across the platform.
Employed **S3** for scalable storage solutions and integrated **Kinesis** for real-time data streaming, enhancing data accessibility.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in sprints and planning meetings to ensure alignment with project objectives and timely deliverables.
Utilized **Helm Charts** for deploying applications in a Kubernetes environment, streamlining the release process.
Contributed to team knowledge sharing through documentation of best practices and technical standards, fostering a collaborative work environment.
